snippet: Andy Murray saved seven match points before beating Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-7 (4), 7-6 (18), 6-1 to reach the Dubai Tennis Championships semifinals on Thursday....

headline.main: Murray Survives Seven Match Points in Dubai Quarterfinals
headline.print_headline: Murray Survives Seven Match Points in Dubai Quarterfinals

lead_paragraph: Andy Murray saved seven match points before beating Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-7 (4), 7-6 (18), 6-1 to reach the Dubai Tennis Championships semifinals on Thursday.
